name: Superior Rune of Exuberance
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: 3% of vitality is converted to healing power.
5% of vitality is converted to precision.
7% of vitality is converted to power.

name: Major Rune of Exuberance
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: 2% of vitality is converted to healing power.
3% of vitality is converted to precision.

name: Minor Rune of Exuberance
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: 1% of vitality is converted to healing power.

name: Minor Rune of Tormenting
description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Major Rune of Tormenting
description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Superior Rune of Tormenting
description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +20% Torment Duration; gain regeneration for 3 seconds after inflicting a foe with torment. (Cooldown: 5 Seconds)

name: Superior Rune of Perplexity
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +20% Confusion duration; decrease strike damage dealt to you by confused foes by 10%.

name: Major Rune of Perplexity
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Minor Rune of Perplexity
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Mini Queen Jennah
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: First Birthday Gift
description: Double-click to open.

details.name: Celebration Bonus
details.description:
100% boost to magic find, WvW rank gain, experience from kills, and gold from kills.
10% bonus to PvP and WvW reward track progress.

name: Mini Steamrider
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Mini Mr. Sparkles
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Twisted Watchwork Portal Device
description: Double-click to be taken to a random location in Tyria. <c=@warning>USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!</c>

name: Recipe: Twisted Watchwork Portal Device
description: Reverse-engineered plans for what appears to be complete gibberish. Whatever it is, it looks really dangerous. Might be kinda fun.

name: Gift From Scarlet
description: How thoughtful! What could it be?

name: Twisted Watchwork Shoulder Scrap
description: Double-click a stack of 250 to assemble a Twisted Watchwork Shoulder Skin.

name: Scarlet's Secret Stash
description: Contains random objects of value. Random chance for Twisted Watchwork Shoulders.

name: Twisted Watchwork Shoulders
description: Double-click to imbue another shoulder item's stats with this appearance (one-time ability).

name: Bit of Twisted Watchwork Scrap
description: Salvage Item

name: Pile of Twisted Watchwork Scrap
description: Salvage Item

name: Jagged Twisted Watchwork Scrap
description: Salvage Item

name: Twisted Watchwork Scrap
description: Salvage Item

name: Salvageable Twisted Watchwork Scrap
description: Salvage Item

name: Mini Frostbite
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Primeval Armor Chest
description: For guardian, warrior, and revenant professions. Contains a heavy helm, coat, legs, boots, shoulders, and gloves, and a Primeval armor skin.

name: Profane Armor Chest
description: For Elementalist, Mesmer, and Necromancer professions. Contains a light helm, coat, legs, boots, shoulders, and gloves, and a Profane armor skin.

name: Krytan Armor Chest
description: For Engineer, Ranger, and Thief professions. Contains a medium helm, coat, legs, boots, shoulders, and gloves, and a Krytan armor skin.

name: 18 Slot Mithril Box
description: 18 Slots
